title: Slow
content:
Transmutation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Slow Information

Description: Alter time to Slow up to 6 enemies. They won't get far, they can't do much, and they're easier to hit. Condition (Slowed): Movement Speed is halved. Armour Class is reduced by 2.
